name: phonebook
description: This repository is used for submitting exercises for [Part 3](https://fullstackopen.com/en/part3) (Programming a server with NodeJS and Express) of the [Full Stack Open course](https://fullstackopen.com/en).

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../FullStackChallenge/part_3/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r build ../../../FullStackChallenge-Part3
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push

author: Kseniia Priakhina
